original_title: Still Game: Live at the Cottiers Theatre, Glasgow
overview: Jack, Victor, and Winston are old-age pensioners who live in a tower block outside Glasgow. One day, the lift breaks down, leaving them stuck in Victor's flatâ€”where they talk about sex, death, family, and neds. Oh, and on the subject of money: Is Victor really as skint as he says he is?
title: Still Game: Live at the Cottiers Theatre, Glasgow
